snippet: Too many state lawmakers would rather bow before the gun lobby than promote public safety.
abstract: Editorial criticizes state lawmakers who are attempting to pass legislation that makes it illegal for federal agents to enforce proposed federal assault weapons ban; calls on state to become laboratories for reasonable gun legislation, rather than continuing to put their citizens at risk as they pledge ever-greater fealty to gun manufacturers (Series: The Gun Challenge).
lead_paragraph: Too many state lawmakers would rather bow before the gun lobby than promote public safety.
